items.name: Clean Recent Documents List
items.category: Falcon Speed & Integrity Core / Speed Boost Cleanup
items.description: [Focus: Privacy + Snappiness] Clears Windows 'Recent' documents and jump-list caches.

args: $ErrorActionPreference='SilentlyContinue'; $recent = Join-Path $env:APPDATA 'Microsoft\Windows\Recent'; Remove-Item -LiteralPath (Join-Path $recent '*') -Recurse -Force; $ad = Join-Path $env:APPDATA 'Microsoft\Windows\Recent\AutomaticDestinations'; $cd = Join-Path $env:APPDATA 'Microsoft\Windows\Recent\CustomDestinations'; Remove-Item -LiteralPath (Join-Path $ad '*') -Recurse -Force; Remove-Item -LiteralPath (Join-Path $cd '*') -Recurse -Force;

items.name: Clean Discord History
items.category: Falcon Speed & Integrity Core / Speed Boost Cleanup
items.description: [Focus: Privacy] Clears local Discord storage (logs, local storage, cache). Note: may log you out; server chat history is not deleted.

args: $ErrorActionPreference='SilentlyContinue'; Get-Process discord,Discord,DiscordCanary,DiscordPTB -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; $targets=@(Join-Path $env:APPDATA 'discord\Local Storage\leveldb',Join-Path $env:APPDATA 'discord\logs',Join-Path $env:LOCALAPPDATA 'Discord\Local Storage\leveldb',Join-Path $env:LOCALAPPDATA 'Discord\logs',Join-Path $env:APPDATA 'discordcanary\Local Storage\leveldb',Join-Path $env:APPDATA 'discordcanary\logs',Join-Path $env:APPDATA 'discordptb\Local Storage\leveldb',Join-Path $env:APPDATA 'discordptb\logs'); foreach($p in $targets){ if(Test-Path $p){ Remove-Item -LiteralPath $p -Recurse -Force } }

items.name: Scan & Fix Drive Errors
items.category: Falcon Speed & Integrity Core / Speed Boost Cleanup
items.description: [Focus: Stability] Runs Windows volume scan/repair (Repair-Volume -Scan) for all fixed drives.

args: $ErrorActionPreference='SilentlyContinue'; $drives = Get-Volume | Where-Object { $_.DriveLetter -and $_.DriveType -eq 'Fixed' } | Select-Object -ExpandProperty DriveLetter; foreach($d in $drives){ try { Repair-Volume -DriveLetter $d -Scan } catch { } }

items.name: Scan & Fix System Errors
items.category: Falcon Speed & Integrity Core / Speed Boost Cleanup
items.description: [Focus: Stability] Runs SFC and DISM health repair to fix corrupted system files.

items.name: Hone Steam Cleaner
items.category: Falcon Speed & Integrity Core / Speed Boost Cleanup
items.description: [Focus: Storage + Snappiness] Cleans Steam download/cache folders (appcache/httpcache, htmlcache, dumps). Does not uninstall games.

args: $ErrorActionPreference='SilentlyContinue'; Get-Process steam -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; $steamPath = (Get-ItemProperty -Path 'HKCU:\Software\Valve\Steam' -Name 'SteamPath' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue).SteamPath; if(-not $steamPath){ $steamPath = Join-Path ${env:ProgramFiles(x86)} 'Steam' } $targets=@(Join-Path $steamPath 'appcache\httpcache',Join-Path $steamPath 'appcache\librarycache',Join-Path $steamPath 'appcache\shadercache',Join-Path $steamPath 'steamapps\downloading',Join-Path $steamPath 'steamapps\temp',Join-Path $steamPath 'dumps',Join-Path $steamPath 'logs',Join-Path $steamPath 'config\htmlcache'); foreach($p in $targets){ if(Test-Path $p){ Remove-Item -LiteralPath $p -Recurse -Force } }
